snippet: An electrical fire broke out in the door panel of the Lincoln MKZ concept late on Tuesday morning.
abstract: An electrical fire broke out in the door panel of the Lincoln MKZ concept late on Tuesday morning.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- To build drama around the debut of its MKZ concept, Lincoln used no fog machines. The sedan nevertheless created a wisp of ambience later in the morning here with an electrical fire in the driver's door panel.

headline.main: Lincoln, on the Hot Seat at Cobo Center

keywords.value: Lincoln Division of Ford Motor Co
